Fascinating_Song.help: You create a song which fascinates your target, infecting their mind with a distraction while you cause them harm. The target suffers energy damage from the song, while the fascination immobilizes them and reduces both their recharge and their chance to hit.
Fascinating_Song.targetHelp: You are fascinated. You have been immobilized and both your recharge and chance to hit have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Exhausting_Song.help: You create a song which exhausts your target, draining the very life out of their bodies. The target suffers energy damage, followed by lethal damage over time. There is a small chance this life energy is returned to you.
Exhausting_Song.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG (Energy), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Heal (Self)
Exhausting_Song.targetHelp: You are suffering from lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Painful_Song.help: You focus your energy to create pain in the mind of your target with song, causing energy damage. The pain caused is so excruciating that the target's mind makes it real, also causing them to suffer from wounds that inflict lethal damage over time.
Painful_Song.targetHelp: You are suffering from lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Forceful_Song.help: You gather your energy into a powerful, hard song, which crashes into your targets with great force. The impact causes smashing damage, some lethal damage over time and has the potential to knock affected targets off their feet.
Forceful_Song.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG (Smashing), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)
Forceful_Song.targetHelp: You are suffering from lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Sorrowful_Song.help: You serenade your targets with a song of woe and sorrow, drawing them into a well of depression. This causes the target to suffer energy damage. Additionally, the targets are afflicted with a loss of their will to live, which manifests in reductions to their regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance.
Sorrowful_Song.targetHelp: Your regeneration, recovery, defense and resistance have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Seductive_Song.help: You enchant your targets with a song of beauty and promise, with the intent of luring them to their death. Any targets around you are enthralled by your song, and suffer energy damage. The seductiveness of the song leaves your target placated, even as you harm them, and allows you to withdraw to use your other songs.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource}'s {PowerName} has placated you, preventing you from acting against her.

Debilitating_Song.help: You unleash a song which can crumble the earth itself, generating a powerful, localized earthquake that causes liquefaction of the ground. The impact of the sonic shockwave deals some minor damage and causes most targets to fall down. The violent shaking also reduces their chance to hit and defense.
Debilitating_Song.shortHelp: Targeted AoE, High DMG (Smashing/Energy), -DEF(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe), -Movement(Foe,Jump,Fly), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} calls out with a {PowerName}, with the power to liquefy the very earth on which you stand!
